Texts.Eng: A rack full of hunting spears made by the Skath.
Texts.Chs: 绘世者制作的装满猎枪的架子。

Texts.Eng: Some sleek lookin' spears. Wouldn't want to get hit by one of those.
Texts.Chs: 一些漂亮的长矛。我不想被那些东西击中。

Texts.Eng: Spears like these are used underwater for hunting. Spears have proven themselves to be more suitable for underwater combat than hammers or swords.
Texts.Chs: 像这样的矛在水下用来打猎。长矛已经证明比锤子或剑更适合水下作战。

Texts.Eng: These spears don't look very shar- Ouch! Okay, they are!
Texts.Chs: 这些长矛看起来不太锋利！好吧，他们是！

Texts.Eng: These spears look extraordinarily sharp. Better not touch them.
Texts.Chs: 这些长矛看起来非常锋利。最好不要碰它们。

Texts.Eng: These spears remind me of the spears of my own kind, though more advanced.
Texts.Chs: 这些长矛让我想起了我自己的长矛，虽然更高级。

Texts.Eng: These spears seem to be made to penetrate tough beast hide and armour alike.
Texts.Chs: 这些长矛似乎可以穿透坚硬的兽皮和盔甲。

Texts.Eng: Waterdragon usesss spears for ssstabbing. Floran approvess!
Texts.Chs: 水龙用长矛刺人。叶族人同意了！
